entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then light snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 1.
